Package com.ultreon.craft.client.input

Class GameCamera

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Camera
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.PerspectiveCamera
com.ultreon.craft.client.input.GameCamera
public class GameCamera extends PerspectiveCamera
The camera used for the game. Originates at 0,0,0. The world is rendered relative to the camera.
Since:
0.1.0
